subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] BPJ's roposal for QS-SAMPA ligatures and half-letters
msgSnippet: That s quite interesting. I got quite the opposite impression, that these two half-characters were quite distinctive. The half-character I have problems with
messageBody:
That's quite interesting. I got quite the opposite impression, that these two half-characters were quite distinctive. The half-character I have problems with is Zoo #12. I keep mixing it up with Valve.

   Note that I am a new reader, and not at all proficient or experienced. YMMV.

----- Original Message ----
My personal opinion is that half Whitewheat and half Win make reading a lot more difficult.
Moira
